title: Passive 6 (two objects)
description: Change the active sentence into the passive. There are two answers for each question.

parts.value: John gave a bar of chocolate to Jill (start with 'Jill').

parts.answer: Jill was given a bar of chocolate (by John).
answerList: Jill was given a bar of chocolate (by John).
A bar of chocolate was given to Jill (by John).

parts.value: John gave a bar of chocolate to Jill (start with 'a bar of chocolate').

parts.answer: A bar of chocolate was given to Jill (by John).
answerList: A bar of chocolate was given to Jill (by John).
Jill was given a bar of chocolate (by John).
